title: Beef And Dairy Network
description:
The number one podcast for those involved or just interested in the production of beef animals and dairy herds. 

A comedy podcast by Benjamin Partridge.

#maxfundrive Extra Episode - Ask A Vet.title: #maxfundrive Extra Episode - Ask A Vet
#maxfundrive Extra Episode - Ask A Vet.description:
MAXFUNDRIVE link: maximumfun.org/join

Because it's #maxfundrive, here's an extra episode made up of recordings of the "Ask A Vet" section from our live shows recorded in 2019.

Thanks to Mike Wozniak.

MaxFunDrive ends on March 28, 2025! Support our show now and get access to bonus content by becoming a member at maximumfun.org/join.

Episode #PODSTRIKE - Gary Burglar from M.title: Episode #PODSTRIKE - Gary Burglar from Mitchell's Europe
Episode #PODSTRIKE - Gary Burglar from M.description:
Beef And Dairy Network Podcast is supporting the global climate strike on Friday 20th September 2019, organised by Greta Thunberg and the UK Student Climate Network.

We speak to Gary Burglar, head of sales at Mitchell's Europe, about an exclusive discount offer for Network members.

Thanks to Tom Neenan.

Find out more at https://globalclimatestrike.net

MaxFunDrive ends on March 28, 2025! Support our show now and get access to bonus content by becoming a member at maximumfun.org/join.

Episode 1 - Dr David Pin.title: Episode 1 - Dr David Pin
Episode 1 - Dr David Pin.description:
Mike Wozniak joins in for this month's episode in which we interview Dr David Pin from the European Space Agency and hear your letters about getting too attached to meat beasts. By Benjamin Partridge and Mike Wozniak.

Stock media provided by Setuniman/Pond5.com and Soundrangers/Pond5.com.

MaxFunDrive ends on March 28, 2025! Support our show now and get access to bonus content by becoming a member at maximumfun.org/join.

Episode 10 - Gina Craig.title: Episode 10 - Gina Craig
Episode 10 - Gina Craig.description:
Celia Pacquola, Nadia Kamil and Tom Neenan join in for this month's episode in which we talk to Dr Sam Archer about how dangerous lamb really is before talking to Gina Craig, a resident of Boogoo Springs, South Australia, about how the world's first cow mayor is doing after 6 months in the job. 

 

By Benjamin Partridge, Tom Neenan and Celia Pacquola, with thanks to Nadia Kamil and David Mark.

 

Music:

“James”

Nick Jaina

Episode 100 - Your Host's Hundredth Epis.title: Episode 100 - Your Host's Hundredth Episode
Episode 100 - Your Host's Hundredth Epis.description:
Mike Wozniak, Susan Harrison, Tom Crowley, Gemma Arrowsmith  and Lucy Farrett join in this month as your host celebrates his hundredth episode.

 

Also thanks to Linnea Sage, Amy Mason, Matthew Crosby, Josie Long, Stevie Martin, Natasha Hodgson and Chris Cantrill.

Chris Cantrill, Amy Gledhill, Anna Leong Brophy, Tom Crowley, Tom Neenan, Nadia Kamil, Mike Wozniak and Linnea Sage join in this month for a live show which took place at London Agrimedia Con 2023.

Episode 105 - Cattle College.description:

Episode 109 - Ted Danson.description:

Episode 111 - Shaving.description:
Mike Wozniak, Linnea Sage and Tom Neenan join us this month as we go deep on cow shaving. Should they be shaved smooth for the summer?
